CustomField.formula: IF( os_Submission_Phone__c != NULL , IF ( BEGINS( os_Submission_Phone__c , ''), SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( os_Submission_Phone__c , "(", ""), ")", ""), " ", ""), "-", ""),"+", ""), IF ( BEGINS( os_Submission_Phone__c , '+'), SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( os_Submission_Phone__c , "(", ""), ")", ""), " ", ""), "-", ""),"+", ""), Null )),Null)
CustomField.label: Format Submission Phone
